name: MobileTrainer
tag_list: mobile, apps, applications, iphone, plam, pre, ifitness, mobiletrainer, itunes, itrain, fitnessbuilder
overview:
MobileTrainer is a Progressive, Fitness Training Service consisting of a peripheral device and web services that uses existing personal media devices and personal computers to guide consumers through Personalized, Evolving Exercise Routines whether they have fitness equipment or no equipment and whether they have a gym membership or not, anytime, anywhere.

MobileTrainer is a patent pending product conceptualized by Jeff Johnson, a personal fitness instructor and college graduate of Oklahoma State University in Business Management. MobileTrainer was developed to help consumers attain a convenient, low cost alternative to the conventional personal fitness instructor. Fitness Fulfillment, LLC was started by Jeff Johnson in 2005. Mr. Johnson began development of MobileTrainer to compete in The 2006 Donald W. Reynolds Governorâ€™s Cup Collegiate Business Plan Competition. This competition is designed to encourage students of Oklahoma universities and colleges to act upon their entrepreneurial ideas and develop skills to lead tomorrow’s innovative new businesses. The goals of this organization was to participate in the competition, to create awareness of the concept of an â€œElectronic Personal Fitness Training Deviceâ€ also known as â€œMobileTrainerâ€, and to gain investment funding and/or establish a partnership with an established corporation with a testable product on the market in order to speed introduction to market. Fitness Fulfillment completed the competition and won a sponsorship award for â€œBest Use of Computer Technologyâ€ valued at $15,000 of in-kind web design and services to be used toward the start-up of the company.

With MobileTrainer, weight settings, repetitions, and rate of perceived exertion of exercises performed during workouts will be entered by using the personal media deviceâ€™s existing controls to input the data. The consumer will have access to food journals and online communities to help them succeed. The user will have the ability to purchase pre-designed workouts to be downloaded to their Personal Media Devices or stored in an exercise library on the userâ€™s MobileTrainer home page for viewing over the internet. MobileTrainer will use the consumerâ€™s data to monitor and Evolve their fitness program. The userâ€™s resistance, nutrition, flexibility, and cardio program will be individually developed and Progressed according to the consumers daily input. An extensive library of over a thousand exercises in the Database will then be used to develop programs specific to the selected Fitness Goal, Skill Level, Equipment Available, Days of the Week to workout, and Target Areas. The exercises will be displayed on the personal media device, PC, or printed on paper showing start, stop, and alternative images demonstrating proper form and technique along with textual instruction. Other features of this system will provide Accountability and Support Groups for the members as well as Reward Incentives for Adherence to the program.
